needToConnect.title: Staking
needToConnect.subtitle: You need to connect your wallet first
needToConnect.description: To be able to view pool ROI and stake your tokens, you need to connect your wallet first. No wallet connection, no farming.

needToApprove.title: Staking
needToApprove.subtitle: You need to approve your tokens first
needToApprove.description: Once you approve, you will be able to stake your tokens to start earning HOLY. You can unstake and collect your rewards at any time without any penalties.

earned.title: Earned HOLY
description: HOLY tokens and can now harvest your yield.
